exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\\ l = l1 ++ l2" on hypothesis of type "incl m (l ++ p)".
Unable to find an instance for the variable a.

exceptions.tactic: apply ListDec.uniquify with (list X) in H1.

original: intros. apply List.Forall2_app_inv_r in H. destruct H as [m1 [m2 [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. apply ListDec.uniquify with (list X) in H1. destruct H1 as [l' [H4 H5]]. apply incl_app_inv in H2. destruct H2 as [H6 H7]. exists l', m2. split. - rewrite H4. rewrite H3. apply app_assoc_reverse. - split. + apply H6. + apply H7.
